00038 #endif

00040 #include "itkImage.h"
00041 #include "itkImageRegionIteratorWithIndex.h"
00042 #include "itkContinuousIndex.h"
00043 
00044 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00045 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00046 
00047 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00048 #include "vnl/vnl_cross.h"
00049 
00050 #include "itkEuler3DTransform.h"
00051 #include "itkExtractImageFilter.h"
00052 #include "itkResampleImageFilter.h"
00053 #include "itkNearestNeighborInterpolateImageFunction.h"
00054 #include "itkJoinSeriesImageFilter.h"
00055 #include "itkOrientImageFilter.h"
00056 
00057 #include "btkDiffusionGradientTable.h"
00058 
00059 #include "vnl/vnl_inverse.h"
00060 
00061 // Local includes
00062 #include "btkLandmarksFileReader.h"
00063 
00064 
00065 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00066 {
00067 
00068   try {
00069 
00070   // Parse arguments
00071   const char *lmksFile = NULL;
00072   const char *mgradResampled = NULL;
00073   const char *mgradName = NULL;
00074 
00075   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Reorient a DWI sequence to standard orientation", ' ', "Unversioned");
00076 
00077   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Input image",true,"","string",cmd);
00078   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputArg("o","output","Reoriented image",true,"","string",cmd);
00079   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> lmksArg("l","landmarks","Landmarks file",true,"","string",cmd);
00080   TCLAP::SwitchArg nnSwitch("","nn","Nearest Neighbor interpolation", cmd, false);
00081   TCLAP::SwitchArg fovSwitch("e","extendFOV","Extends the FOV to avoid image cropping", cmd, false);
00082   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> mgradArg("","mean-gradient","Mean gradient",false,"","string",cmd);
00083   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> mgradResampledArg("","mean-gradient-resampled","Mean gradient resampled",false,"","string",cmd);
00084 
00085   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00086 
00087   lmksFile        = lmksArg.getValue().c_str();
00088   bool nn         = nnSwitch.getValue();
00089 
00090   mgradName = mgradArg.getValue().c_str();
00091   mgradResampled = mgradResampledArg.getValue().c_str();
00092 
00093 
00094   const    unsigned int    Dimension = 4;
00095 
00096   char inputImageFile[255];
00097   strcpy( inputImageFile, (char*)inputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00098   strcat ( inputImageFile,".nii" );
00099 
00100   char bvec[255];
00101   strcpy( bvec, (char*)inputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00102   strcat ( bvec,".bvec" );
00103 
00104   char bval[255];
00105   strcpy( bval, (char*)inputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00106   strcat ( bval,".bval" );
00107 
00108   char outputImageFile[255];
00109   strcpy( outputImageFile, (char*)outputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00110   strcat ( outputImageFile,".nii.gz" );
00111 
00112   char bvec_out[255];
00113   strcpy( bvec_out, (char*)outputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00114   strcat ( bvec_out,".bvec" );
00115 
00116   char bval_out[255];
00117   strcpy( bval_out, (char*)outputArg.getValue().c_str() );
00118   strcat ( bval_out,".bval" );
00119 
00120   // Read image
00121 
00122   typedef itk::Image< short, Dimension >  ImageType;
00123   typedef itk::Image< short, 3 >  Image3DType;
00124 
00125   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType > ImageReaderType;
00126   ImageReaderType::Pointer  imageReader  = ImageReaderType::New();
00127   imageReader -> SetFileName(  inputImageFile );
00128   imageReader -> Update();
00129   ImageType::Pointer image = imageReader->GetOutput();
00130 
00131   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< Image3DType > Image3DReaderType;
00132 
00133   Image3DType::Pointer mgrad;
00134   if ( strcmp(mgradName,"") )
00135   {
00136     Image3DReaderType::Pointer    mgradReader    = Image3DReaderType::New();
00137     mgradReader -> SetFileName( mgradName );
00138     mgradReader -> Update();
00139     mgrad = mgradReader -> GetOutput();
00140   }
00141 
00142   // Read landmarks
00143 
00144   btk::btkLandmarksFileReader::Pointer landRead = btk::btkLandmarksFileReader::New();
00145   landRead->SetInputFileName(lmksFile);
00146   landRead->Update();
00147 
00148   double *lpt_ras = landRead->GetOutputLPT();
00149   double *rpt_ras = landRead->GetOutputRPT();
00150   double *apt_ras = landRead->GetOutputAPT();
00151   double *ppt_ras = landRead->GetOutputPPT();
00152 
00153   // Convert points to lps coordinates
00154 
00155   Image3DType::PointType leftPoint, rightPoint, anteriorPoint, posteriorPoint;
00156 
00157   leftPoint[0]      = -lpt_ras[0]; leftPoint[1]      = -lpt_ras[1]; leftPoint[2]      = lpt_ras[2];
00158   rightPoint[0]     = -rpt_ras[0]; rightPoint[1]     = -rpt_ras[1]; rightPoint[2]     = rpt_ras[2];
00159   anteriorPoint[0]  = -apt_ras[0]; anteriorPoint[1]  = -apt_ras[1]; anteriorPoint[2]  = apt_ras[2];
00160   posteriorPoint[0] = -ppt_ras[0]; posteriorPoint[1] = -ppt_ras[1]; posteriorPoint[2] = ppt_ras[2];
00161 
00162   // Extract b0 original sequence
00163 
00164   ImageType::SizeType     size    = image -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00165   ImageType::IndexType    index   = image -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00166   ImageType::SpacingType  spacing = image -> GetSpacing();
00167   unsigned int numberOfFrames = size[3];
00168 
00169   typedef itk::ExtractImageFilter< ImageType, Image3DType > ExtractorType;
00170   ExtractorType::Pointer extractor = ExtractorType::New();
00171   extractor -> SetInput( image );
00172 
00173   ImageType::RegionType region;
00174   index[3] = 0;
00175   size[3]  = 0;
00176   region.SetIndex(index);
00177   region.SetSize(size);
00178 
00179   extractor -> SetExtractionRegion( region );
00180   extractor -> SetDirectionCollapseToSubmatrix();
00181   extractor -> Update();
00182 
00183   Image3DType::Pointer b0_ori = extractor -> GetOutput();
00184 
00185   // Recover original direction matrix
00186 
00187   vnl_matrix<double> oriDirection(3,3);
00188   oriDirection = b0_ori -> GetDirection().GetVnlMatrix();
00189 
00190   // Reorient mean gradient to RAI
00191 
00192   typedef itk::OrientImageFilter< Image3DType, Image3DType >  FilterType;
00193 
00194   Image3DType::Pointer mgrad_reo;
00195 
00196   if ( strcmp(mgradName,"") )
00197   {
00198     FilterType::Pointer filter = FilterType::New();
00199     filter -> SetInput( mgrad  );
00200     filter -> UseImageDirectionOn();
00201     filter -> SetDesiredCoordinateOrientation( itk::SpatialOrientation::ITK_COORDINATE_ORIENTATION_RAI );
00202     filter -> Update();
00203     mgrad_reo = filter -> GetOutput();
00204   }
00205 
00206   // Reorient sequence to RAI
00207 
00208   typedef itk::JoinSeriesImageFilter< Image3DType, ImageType > JoinerType;
00209   JoinerType::Pointer joiner = JoinerType::New();
00210   joiner -> SetOrigin( 0.0 );
00211   joiner -> SetSpacing( spacing[3] );
00212 
00213   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfFrames; i++)
00214   {
00215     index[3] = i;
00216 
00217     ImageType::RegionType desiredRegion;
00218     desiredRegion.SetSize(  size  );
00219     desiredRegion.SetIndex( index );
00220 
00221     extractor -> SetExtractionRegion( desiredRegion );
00222 
00223     FilterType::Pointer filter = FilterType::New();
00224     filter -> SetInput( extractor -> GetOutput()  );
00225     filter -> UseImageDirectionOn();
00226     filter -> SetDesiredCoordinateOrientation( itk::SpatialOrientation::ITK_COORDINATE_ORIENTATION_RAI );
00227     filter -> Update();
00228 
00229     joiner -> SetInput( i, filter -> GetOutput() );
00230   }
00231 
00232   joiner -> Update();
00233 
00234   ImageType::Pointer image_reo = joiner -> GetOutput();
00235 
00236   // Store original Direction and origin.
00237   ImageType::SizeType size_reo = image_reo -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00238   ImageType::IndexType index_reo = image_reo -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00239 
00240   size_reo[3] = 0;
00241   index_reo[3] = 0;
00242 
00243   ImageType::RegionType region_reo;
00244   region_reo.SetIndex(index_reo);
00245   region_reo.SetSize(size_reo);
00246 
00247   ExtractorType::Pointer extractor_reo = ExtractorType::New();
00248 
00249   extractor_reo -> SetInput( image_reo );
00250   extractor_reo -> SetExtractionRegion( region_reo );
00251   extractor_reo -> SetDirectionCollapseToSubmatrix();
00252   extractor_reo -> Update();
00253 
00254   Image3DType::Pointer b0_reo = extractor_reo -> GetOutput();
00255 
00256   vnl_matrix<double> reoDirection(3,3);
00257   reoDirection = b0_reo -> GetDirection().GetVnlMatrix();
00258   vnl_matrix<double> reoDirectionTrans(3,3);
00259   reoDirectionTrans = reoDirection.transpose();
00260 
00261   // Reorient gradients accordingly
00262 
00263   typedef btk::DiffusionGradientTable< ImageType > GradientTableType;
00264   GradientTableType::Pointer gradientTable = GradientTableType::New();
00265 
00266   vnl_matrix<double> rotationMatrix;
00267   rotationMatrix = reoDirectionTrans*oriDirection;
00268 
00269   gradientTable -> SetNumberOfGradients(numberOfFrames);
00270   gradientTable -> SetRotationMatrix( rotationMatrix );
00271   gradientTable -> LoadFromFile( bvec);
00272   gradientTable -> RotateGradients();
00273 
00274   // Create the image in standard orientation
00275   // p = I*S*idx + O_center
00276 
00277   ImageType::Pointer stdImage = joiner -> GetOutput();
00278 
00279   ImageType::DirectionType stdImageDirection  = stdImage -> GetDirection();
00280   stdImageDirection.SetIdentity();
00281   stdImage -> SetDirection (stdImageDirection);
00282 
00283   ImageType::SpacingType stdSpacing  = stdImage -> GetSpacing();
00284   ImageType::SizeType    stdSize     = stdImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00285   ImageType::IndexType   stdIndex    = stdImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetIndex();
00286 
00287   ImageType::PointType stdOrigin;
00288   Image3DType::PointType stdOrigin3D;
00289 
00290   for (unsigned int i=0; i<3; i++)
00291   {
00292     stdOrigin[i] = (1.0-stdSize[i])*0.5*stdSpacing[i];
00293     stdOrigin3D[i] = stdOrigin[i];
00294   }
00295 
00296   stdImage -> SetOrigin( stdOrigin );
00297 
00298   // Create the mean gradient in standard orientation
00299 
00300   Image3DType::Pointer mgrad_std = mgrad_reo;
00301 
00302   if ( strcmp(mgradName,"") )
00303   {
00304     Image3DType::DirectionType mgrad_std_direction  = mgrad_std -> GetDirection();
00305     mgrad_std_direction.SetIdentity();
00306     mgrad_std -> SetDirection (mgrad_std_direction);
00307     mgrad_std -> SetOrigin(stdOrigin3D);
00308   }
00309 
00310   // Obtain directions LPS directions in standard image
00311 
00312   vnl_vector<double> left_lps(3), pos_lps(3), sup_lps(3);
00313 
00314   left_lps = reoDirectionTrans*( leftPoint.GetVnlVector() - rightPoint.GetVnlVector() );
00315   left_lps.normalize();
00316 
00317   pos_lps = reoDirectionTrans*( posteriorPoint.GetVnlVector() - anteriorPoint.GetVnlVector() );
00318   pos_lps.normalize();
00319 
00320   sup_lps = vnl_cross_3d(left_lps,pos_lps);
00321 
00322 
00323   // TODO The following code is quite repeated throug the library
00324   // we should include it somewhere else
00325 
00326   vnl_matrix<double> R(3,3);
00327   R.set_identity();
00328 
00329   R(0,0) = left_lps(0); R(0,1) = left_lps(1); R(0,2) = left_lps(2);
00330   R(1,0) = pos_lps(0) ; R(1,1) = pos_lps(1);  R(1,2) = pos_lps(2);
00331   R(2,0) = sup_lps(0) ; R(2,1) = sup_lps(1);  R(2,2) = sup_lps(2);
00332 
00333   // Corrects rotation matrix
00334 
00335   vnl_matrix<double> PQ = R;
00336   vnl_matrix<double> NQ = R;
00337   vnl_matrix<double> PQNQDiff;
00338 
00339   const unsigned int maximumIterations = 100;
00340 
00341   for(unsigned int ni = 0; ni < maximumIterations; ni++ )
00342   {
00343     // Average current Qi with its inverse transpose
00344     NQ = ( PQ + vnl_inverse_transpose( PQ ) ) / 2.0;
00345     PQNQDiff = NQ - PQ;
00346     if( PQNQDiff.frobenius_norm() < 1e-7 )
00347     {
00348 //      std::cout << "Polar decomposition used " << ni << " iterations " << std::endl;
00349       break;
00350     }
00351     else
00352     {
00353       PQ = NQ;
00354     }
00355   }
00356 
00357   // Correct and write image
00358 
00359   ExtractorType::Pointer stdExtractor = ExtractorType::New();
00360   stdExtractor -> SetInput( stdImage );
00361 
00362   stdIndex[3] = 0;
00363   stdSize[3]  = 0;
00364 
00365   ImageType::RegionType stdRegion;
00366   stdRegion.SetIndex(stdIndex);
00367   stdRegion.SetSize(stdSize);
00368 
00369   stdExtractor -> SetExtractionRegion( stdRegion );
00370   stdExtractor -> SetDirectionCollapseToSubmatrix();
00371   stdExtractor -> Update();
00372 
00373   Image3DType::Pointer stdB0 = stdExtractor -> GetOutput();
00374 
00375   typedef itk::Euler3DTransform<double> TransformType;
00376   TransformType::Pointer transform = TransformType::New();
00377 
00378   typedef itk::ContinuousIndex< double, 3 > ContinuousIndexType;
00379   ContinuousIndexType centerIndex;
00380 
00381   centerIndex[0] = (stdSize[0] - 1.0) / 2.0;
00382   centerIndex[1] = (stdSize[1] - 1.0) / 2.0;
00383   centerIndex[2] = (stdSize[2] - 1.0) / 2.0;
00384 
00385   Image3DType::PointType centerPoint;
00386 
00387   stdB0 -> TransformContinuousIndexToPhysicalPoint(centerIndex, centerPoint);
00388 
00389   transform -> SetCenter( centerPoint );
00390   transform -> SetRotationMatrix( NQ );
00391 
00392 //  TODO Cannot constrain the rotation because sometimes it is necessary to rotate in xy
00393 //  Something I could do is to round the rotations in xy to n*pi*/2 ...
00394 //  transform -> SetRotation( 0.0, 0.0, transform -> GetAngleZ() );
00395 
00396   // Extend FOV according to the transformation
00397 
00398   Image3DType::SizeType  resamplingSize;
00399   Image3DType::IndexType lowerIndex; lowerIndex.Fill(0);
00400   Image3DType::IndexType upperIndex; upperIndex.Fill(0);
00401 
00402   if ( fovSwitch.isSet() )
00403   {
00404     typedef itk::ImageRegionIteratorWithIndex< Image3DType > Image3DIteratorType;
00405     Image3DIteratorType b0It( stdB0, stdB0 -> GetLargestPossibleRegion() );
00406 
00407     Image3DType::IndexType b0Index;
00408     Image3DType::IndexType b0TransformedIndex;
00409 
00410     Image3DType::PointType b0Point;
00411     Image3DType::PointType b0TransformedPoint;
00412 
00413     // Even when only the corners are necessary, the code is shorter in this way
00414     // (and it's not very expensive to compute it)
00415 
00416     for(b0It.GoToBegin(); !b0It.IsAtEnd(); ++b0It)
00417     {
00418       b0Index = b0It.GetIndex();
00419       stdB0 -> TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(b0Index, b0Point);
00420       b0TransformedPoint = transform -> TransformPoint(b0Point);
00421       stdB0 -> TransformPhysicalPointToIndex(b0TransformedPoint, b0TransformedIndex);
00422 
00423       for (unsigned int i = 0; i<3; i++)
00424         if ( b0TransformedIndex[i] < lowerIndex[i] ) lowerIndex[i] = b0TransformedIndex[i];
00425         else if
00426            ( b0TransformedIndex[i] > upperIndex[i] ) upperIndex[i] = b0TransformedIndex[i];
00427 
00428     }
00429 
00430     resamplingSize[0] = upperIndex[0] - lowerIndex[0] + 1;
00431     resamplingSize[1] = upperIndex[1] - lowerIndex[1] + 1;
00432     resamplingSize[2] = upperIndex[2] - lowerIndex[2] + 1;
00433 
00434   } else
00435   {
00436     resamplingSize = stdB0 -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00437   }
00438 
00439   Image3DType::PointType resamplingOrigin;
00440   stdB0 -> TransformIndexToPhysicalPoint(lowerIndex, resamplingOrigin );
00441 
00442   transform -> SetRotationMatrix( NQ.transpose() );
00443 
00444   // Resampling
00445 
00446   typedef itk::ResampleImageFilter< Image3DType, Image3DType >  ResamplerType;
00447 
00448   typedef itk::NearestNeighborInterpolateImageFunction< Image3DType >  InterpolatorType;
00449   InterpolatorType::Pointer interpolator = InterpolatorType::New();
00450 
00451   typedef itk::JoinSeriesImageFilter< Image3DType, ImageType > JoinerType;
00452   JoinerType::Pointer joiner2 = JoinerType::New();
00453   joiner2 -> SetOrigin( 0.0 );
00454   // TODO Does it change something the 4th dimension spacing in diffusion sequences?
00455   joiner2 -> SetSpacing( 1 );
00456 
00457   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfFrames; i++)
00458   {
00459     stdIndex[3] = i;
00460     stdSize[3]  = 0;
00461 
00462     ImageType::RegionType stdRegion;
00463     stdRegion.SetIndex( stdIndex );
00464     stdRegion.SetSize( stdSize );
00465 
00466     stdExtractor -> SetExtractionRegion( stdRegion );
00467     stdExtractor -> Update();
00468 
00469     ResamplerType::Pointer resampler = ResamplerType::New();
00470 
00471     if (nn)
00472     {
00473       resampler -> SetInterpolator(interpolator);
00474     }
00475 
00476     resampler -> SetInput( stdExtractor -> GetOutput() );
00477     resampler -> SetTransform(transform);
00478     resampler -> SetDefaultPixelValue(0);
00479     resampler -> SetSize( resamplingSize );
00480     resampler -> SetOutputOrigin( resamplingOrigin );
00481     resampler -> SetOutputDirection( stdExtractor -> GetOutput() -> GetDirection()  );
00482     resampler -> SetOutputSpacing( stdExtractor -> GetOutput() -> GetSpacing() );
00483 
00484     resampler -> Update();
00485 
00486     joiner2 -> SetInput( i, resampler -> GetOutput() );
00487 
00488   }
00489 
00490   joiner2 -> Update();
00491 
00492 
00493   Image3DType::Pointer mgrad_resampled;
00494 
00495   if ( strcmp(mgradName,"") )
00496   {
00497     ResamplerType::Pointer resampler = ResamplerType::New();
00498 
00499     if (nn)
00500     {
00501       resampler -> SetInterpolator(interpolator);
00502     }
00503 
00504     resampler -> SetInput( mgrad_std );
00505     resampler -> SetTransform( transform );
00506     resampler -> SetDefaultPixelValue(0);
00507     resampler -> UseReferenceImageOn();
00508     resampler -> SetReferenceImage( mgrad_std );
00509 
00510     resampler -> Update();
00511     mgrad_resampled = resampler -> GetOutput();
00512   }
00513 
00514   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType > ImageWriterType;
00515   ImageWriterType::Pointer  imageWriter  = ImageWriterType::New();
00516   imageWriter -> SetInput( joiner2 -> GetOutput() );
00517   imageWriter -> SetFileName(  outputImageFile );
00518   imageWriter -> Update();
00519 
00520   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< Image3DType > Image3DWriterType;
00521   if ( strcmp(mgradName,"") )
00522   {
00523     Image3DWriterType::Pointer  image3DWriter  = Image3DWriterType::New();
00524     image3DWriter -> SetInput( mgrad_resampled );
00525     image3DWriter -> SetFileName(  mgradResampled );
00526     image3DWriter -> Update();
00527   }
00528 
00529   // Change gradient table
00530 
00531   gradientTable -> SetNumberOfGradients(numberOfFrames);
00532   gradientTable -> SetImage( stdImage );
00533   gradientTable -> SetTransform( transform );
00534   gradientTable -> RotateGradientsInWorldCoordinates();
00535   gradientTable -> SaveToFile( bvec_out);
00536 
00537   // Write b-values
00538   char clcopybval[255];
00539   sprintf(clcopybval,"cp %s %s",bval,bval_out);
00540   system(clcopybval);
00541 
00542 
00543   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00544   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00545 
00546   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00547 }
